thread.title: DONT STAY HERE for PARK andFLY
thread.title_full: DONT STAY HERE for PARK andFLY - Review of Holiday Inn Express San Francisco Airport-North, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: charlieott62
title: DONT STAY HERE for PARK andFLY
text:
We stayed here for a park and fly reservation on February 21,2017. They told us the rate for park and fly was $9.99 per night. When we checked out after 4 days of parking they charged us $100.00. We talked to the general manager of the property and she told us to take a hike. We then called customer service and still have not heard back from them.
To top it off, when I rated them poorly on the Holiday Inn site because of this, Holiday Inn refused to post my rating saying in was irrelevant and inappropriate.
They don't want the truth just nice comments. Do not stay here.
